"Huh? You came here again?": "Bringing your dad up to speed?"
"No sighs today?"
"About my future as an Instructor, yeah."

"I told Dad how hard it was at first,
but now I think I might be able to do this."
"Not today!"

"I was just telling Dad about how I think I
might actually be able to do this whole Instructor thing."

"More importantly, I never did get to
thank you properly, did I?"

"Thank you.
For saving me, and all of my recruits."
"You deserve most of the credit."
"Couldn't've done it without everyone's cooperation."
"I mean, sure, I gave it everything I had back there."

"But if you hadn't showed up,
things could've been much, much worse."

"That's true.
I'm really proud of them."
"Things went as well as they did because you were there."
"You've been helping me out all this time, <%me>."
"I mean, you always rescue me when I get in over my head."
"And you also cheer me up when I'm feeling sad."

"You're always there for me, so I feel like
that's why I can keep giving it my all."
"...You'll always be by my side, won't you?"
"N-No, wait...!"
"Forget that last part!"
"N-Not in a weird way, okay!"

"I-I just meant like...
let's keep working together side-by-side."
"As ARKS who protect Halpha, y'know?"
"I couldn't agree more."
"Forever and ever?"
"Good."

"W-w-wait wait wait!!
Agh, jeez... Don't you get started!"

"Well, anyways, I've said what I wanted to.
Let's give it our best!"
